p: Ethyl (E)-3-phenyl-2-(pyridin-4-ylmethyl)acrylate (31). Purification by flash column chromatography on silica gel using ethyl acetate/petroleum ether (2:8) allowed the isolation of the desired product in 40% yield as an orange oil. E and Z isomers were obtained. E: 1H NMR (300 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 8.52 (d, J = 5.8 Hz, 2H), 8.02 (s, 1H), 7.49 − 7.31 (m, 5H), 7.15 (s, 2H), 4.24 (q, J = 7.1 Hz, 2H), 3.95 (s, 2H), 1.26 (dd, J = 12.0, 4.9 Hz, 3H).
